channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Far-left mayor arrested at ICE facility denies impeding law enforcement, says protest 'absolutely' effective
item.description: Newark Mayor Ras Baraka said in a debate Monday his actions that got him arrested days earlier at an ICE facility were "absolutely" an effective prote...

item.title: Pentagon stopping gender transition treatment for transgender troops
item.description: The Pentagon is ending gender transition treatment for transgender troops, as the Trump administration moves to boot them from the U.S. military.

item.title: Trump endorses Jack Ciattarelli for New Jersey governor: 'A winner'
item.description: President Donald Trump gave a full endorsement to Jack Ciattarelli in the race for governor of New Jersey on Monday. Ciattarelli was once a harsh crit...

item.title: Monica Crowley clears Senate confirmation for key State Department ambassadorship
item.description: Monica Crowley will now join the State Department in President Donald Trump's second administration. She was confirmed by the Senate on Monday night.

item.title: Medicaid Is Junk Health Care
item.description: Will Republicans have the courage to expose that and improve it?

item.title: Trump targets massive investments in first Middle East trip
item.description: President Donald Trump tours Persian Gulf allies to push $2T in deals, counter Iran and revive U.S. influence amid Gaza war, nuclear tensions.

item.title: ‘Daylight’ with Israel, Trump Style
item.description: Israelis can be forgiven for wondering whether the Netanyahu government has overinvested in its relationship with the Trump administration.

item.title: You Can Criticize The Pope And Still Believe In God’s Sovereignty
item.description: Sometimes God raises up leaders for our blessing and sometimes for our punishment, but He ordains them nonetheless.

item.title: Passing the Big, Beautiful Bill
item.description: Republicans need to be willing to say ‘no’ to the moderates in the caucus.

item.title: Trump's strong economy defies gloomy Wall Street predictions of recession
item.description: Since President Trump's election, economists and media pundits have been awash in predictions of a recession, stock market crash and doom narratives. ...

item.title: Trump Is Right To Prioritize Refugees Who Will Make Better Americans
item.description: A successful refugee policy must balance sustainability and cultural coherence.

item.title: Rich D.C. Colleges Don’t Deserve Taxpayer Giveaways
item.description: Taxpayers in Washington should not be subsidizing wealthy institutions while funding for essential city services is slashed to the bone.

item.title: A New Pope Leo for a New Industrial Revolution
item.description: Leo XIII read Frederic Bastiat and was impressed by what good economics could teach us. The new Pope Leo XIV should embrace his example.
